card.name: Star-Speckled Ursine

card.name: Piercing Star

card.name: Alexei, Rime Magnarch
card.text: As long as Alexei entered this turn and you spent three or more {S} to cast him, you may activate his loyalty abilities twice rather than only once. [+1]: At the beginning of the next end step, untap up to one land you control and up to one snow land you control. Draw a card. [-2]: Tap target nonland permanent and put a stun counter on it. It loses all abilities for as long as it remains tapped. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Tap an untapped snow creature or snow land you control: Draw a card."

card.name: Lignification
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses all abilities, has base power and toughness 1/1, and is a Plant in addition to its other types.

card.name: Elai Ascendant
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, you may activate one of Elai Ascendant's loyalty abilities as though none of them have been activated this turn. [+2]: Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play one of those cards this turn. [0]: Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled with Elai Ascendant. [-X]: Elai Ascendant deals twice X damage to target creature. Exile cards from the top of your library equal to the excess damage dealt this way. You may play those cards this turn.

card.name: Starchaser // Catch Up
card.text:
Flying Whenever this creature attacks, if defending player controls more lands than you, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
---
If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three basic Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Xyvera, Who Remains
card.text: Menace When Xyvera enters or whenever you play a land or cast a spell you don't own, exile the top card of target opponent's library. You may play that card for as long as it remains in exile, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

card.name: Knutr, Blighted Embrace
card.text: When Knutr enters, create a Treasure token. Whenever a creature dies, exile the top card of its controller's library. Until your next end step, you may play that card.

card.name: Longboat Hunter // Sink Ships
card.text:
This spell can't be countered. Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, and Serpent spells you control can't be countered.
---
Return all noncreature, nonland permanents to their owners' hands. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Katjar Peacebane
card.text: Flying, vigilance, trample Spells you cast have pyre. (Your creatures can help cast those spells. Each creature you tap while casting those spells pays for {1}. Each other creature you sacrifice pays for {2} instead.) When this creature dies, if it attacked since your last upkeep, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.

card.name: Celestial Vault
card.text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Sacrifice this artifact: You may attach any number of Equipment you control to target creature.

card.name: Scryer's Safeguard
card.text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Frostdrakkon's Shadow
card.text: Tap all nonland permanents target opponent controls. Distribute X stun counters among those permanents, where X is the amount of {S} spent to cast this spell.

card.name: Runewarper
card.text: Pyre (Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1}. Each other creature you sacrifice pays for {2} instead.) When this creature enters, each opponent loses 1 life for each creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Unleashed Malevolence
card.text: Flying Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value 5 or greater, each of your opponents loses 2 life and you draw a card.

card.name: Challenge the Heavens
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Draw cards equal to the number of counters on target permanent. III — You may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. ​

card.name: Convergent Cairn
card.text: If a triggered ability of a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it triggers, it triggers an additional time. {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Kjaldiran Cavalry // Rally
card.text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you've cast both a creature spell and noncreature spell this turn, this creature deals 4 damage to each opponent.
---
If a source you control would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Drakkon Tender
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and each Dragon creature you control.

card.name: Convergence Pack
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, stargaze. (Reveal a Luminary you own from outside the game to put it into your hand and/or activate its cluster ability without paying its generic cost.) Whenever you activate a cluster ability, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Wicked Elderspirit
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and lose 1 life. {B}{B}{B}{B}{B}{B}, Discard six cards, Sacrifice six other creatures: Target opponent loses the game. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.text:
Whenever a creature you control that has an Adventure attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
---

card.name: Realmsieger // Bring Ruin
card.text:
Whenever you cast or copy an Adventure spell, if it's your main phase, there's an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.
---
Bring Ruin deals 4 damage to each creature and/or planeswalker that doesn't have an Adventure. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Self-Destruct
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever an artifact, enchantment, creature, or planeswalker you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a card type with it.

card.text: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may have target player mill a card. {1}{S}: Untap this creature.

card.name: Frost Giants of Skolha
card.text: This creature enters tapped unless there's a snow card in your graveyard.

card.name: Cryomancer's Assembly
card.text: Create an X/X blue Golem snow artifact creature token, where X is 1 plus the number of snow cards in your graveyard. Flashback {5}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Skolhan Crowcaster // Take Wing
card.text:
Whenever you cast or copy a Adventure spell spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.
---
Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

prop.type: Creature — Human Wizard Ramger // Sorcery — Adventure

card.name: Wildspark Mage // Impulsion
card.text:
Double strike Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {1} less to cast.
---
Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Vilemoon Apparition
card.text: When this creature dies, search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {2}, Sacrifice this creature: You may put up to two land cards from your hand onto the battlefield. They become 1/1 black Bird creatures with flying in addition to their other types.

card.name: Clear the Mind
card.text: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. Draw a card.

card.name: Cosmic Oppression
card.text: When this enchantment enters, search your library for a Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Each player may only cast one spell each turn.

card.name: Grave Seal
card.text: {T}: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if there are four or more card types among cards exiled with this artifact.

card.name: Throne of the Celestial Realm
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast enchantment spells or activate cluster abilities. {4}, {T}: Stargaze. (Reveal a Luminary you own from outside the game to put it into your hand and/or activate its cluster ability without paying its generic cost.)
